Configuration.Name: L1=4m_L2=1p3m_offset_apx10mm_neg19NVStilt
Configuration.SetupScript:
#config.wavelength = 6 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 28300') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 1.08') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread 0.41')
config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 450 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = 0 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 10.42 config.beamcenterz = 96.46 config.drive()
